Test.Name: Correct response
Test.Description: Check DYNAMIC TRACK CONFIGURATION test when DUT sends correct response. Recording is created.

Test.Name: Correct response: not tested recording has no tracks
Test.Description: Check DYNAMIC TRACK CONFIGURATION test when DUT sends correct response. Recording is not created.

Test.Name: Correct response: no recordings
Test.Description: Check DYNAMIC TRACK CONFIGURATION test when DUT sends correct response. There was no recordings on the DUT.

Test.Name: Tracktoken is not unique
Test.Description: Check DYNAMIC TRACK CONFIGURATION test when track token is not unique

Test.Name: Track is not presented after creation
Test.Description: Check DYNAMIC TRACK CONFIGURATION test when track is not presented after creation

Test.Name: Tracktoken not unique - 2
Test.Description: Check DYNAMIC TRACK CONFIGURATION test when DUT sends recording with same tracktokens

Test.Name: Incorrect response: created recording has no tracks
Test.Description: Check DYNAMIC TRACK CONFIGURATION test when DUT sends correct response

Test.Name: Incorrect response:created recording is not returned
Test.Description: Check DYNAMIC TRACK CONFIGURATION test when DUT sends incorrect response: DUT did not return Recording with RecordingToken=RecordingToken1 in GetRecordingsResponse message after recording creation

Test.Name: Incorrect response: deleted recording is returned
Test.Description: Check DYNAMIC TRACK CONFIGURATION test when DUT sends incorrect response: The DUT returned Recording with RecordingToken=RecordingToken1 in GetRecordingsResponse message after recording deletion

Test.Name: SourceId parameter in created recording is differ
Test.Description: Check DYNAMIC TRACK CONFIGURATION test when DUT sends incorrect response: The SourceId parameter value of recording (RecordingToken=RecordingToken1) in updated recordings list differ from value in CreateRecordingRequest message

Test.Name: Name parameter in created recording is differ
Test.Description: Check DYNAMIC TRACK CONFIGURATION test when DUT sends incorrect response: The Name parameter value of recording (RecordingToken=RecordingToken1) in updated recordings list differ from value in CreateRecordingRequest message

Test.Name: Location parameter in created recording is differ
Test.Description: Check DYNAMIC TRACK CONFIGURATION test when DUT sends incorrect response: The Location parameter value of recording (RecordingToken=RecordingToken1) in updated recordings list differ from value in CreateRecordingRequest message

Test.Name: Description parameter in created recording is differ
Test.Description: Check DYNAMIC TRACK CONFIGURATION test when DUT sends incorrect response: The Description parameter value of recording (RecordingToken=RecordingToken1) in updated recordings list differ from value in CreateRecordingRequest message

Test.Name: Address parameter in created recording is differ
Test.Description: Check DYNAMIC TRACK CONFIGURATION test when DUT sends incorrect response: The Address parameter value of recording (RecordingToken=RecordingToken1) in updated recordings list differ from value in CreateRecordingRequest message

Test.Name: Content parameter in created recording is differ
Test.Description: Check DYNAMIC TRACK CONFIGURATION test when DUT sends incorrect response: The Content parameter value of recording (RecordingToken=RecordingToken1) in updated recordings list differ from value in CreateRecordingRequest message

Test.Name: MaximumRetentionTime parameter in created recording is differ
Test.Description: Check DYNAMIC TRACK CONFIGURATION test when DUT sends incorrect response: The MaximumRetentionTime parameter value of recording (RecordingToken=RecordingToken1) in updated recordings list differ from value in CreateRecordingRequest message

Test.Name: Not unique Recording token
Test.Description: Check DYNAMIC TRACK CONFIGURATION test when DUT sends incorrect response: DUT returned RecordingToken value in the CreateRecordingResponse not unique with Recording Tokens in initial GetRecordingsResponse message

Test.Name: No old recording after recording creation
Test.Description: Check DYNAMIC TRACK CONFIGURATION test when DUT sends incorrect response: Recording from initial list is not presented in GetRecordings response after recording cration
